snippet.title: The Last Planets - Version 0.0.8, A galaxy awakened - Online Multiplayer Trailer  4K
snippet.description:
GAME IS FREE TO TRY: 🟢 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.TronusGames.TheLastPlanets


Heyo to everyone, here the new trailer announcing the new features for the game: the 🫂 Online Multiplayer. Feel free to download the game and try it out... below a brief description of the whole project...




This is a game assembled by an 🎮 indie developer and by an awesome 🎹 sound designer, that you can play both with your friends or other people Online or Offline 😊

💸 No P2W (Pay To Win)
💳 No Microtransactions based
⌚ No Advertising

This is intended to be a 🆓 Free Game to try it, with one unique purchase to 🪙 Unlock it Completely.
Inside there are 3 types of purchases:
🪙 1 to Unlock the Full game for you
💰 1 to Unlock the Full game for you and 1 more friend
💎 1 to Unlock the Full game for you and 3 more friends

Obviously, if you buy the boxes with the higher prices, 👂 less you and your friends will pay the single 🔓 game activation.
If you want to support this kind of development, thanks in advance. 🦄


This is an ♾️ infinite and endless run, adventure, arcade, action, 2D/3D,
📶 Online / 📴 Offline, 🫂 Multiplayer, 🍎 physics based, 🌌 space and planets exploring game, with some RPG and 🔥 soulslike features.
So you can play 📶 🫂 Online in Multiplayer with your friends or other people and you will need to cooperate with the whole community to unlock game contents.
So grab or make new friends to explore the hidden areas of the game...


00:00 - Intro
00:10 - Gameplay
01:06 - Outro




Every 🗣️ feedback is appreciated and welcome to improve the game.


Follow our 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 communities on: 
🎮 TronusGames Website: https://bio.link/tronusgames
🎮 Project Utgardr Website: https://bio.link/projectutgardr

🔵 Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/developer/tronusgames
🟤 Itch.io: https://tronusgames.itch.io/
⚪ Game Jolt: https://gamejolt.com/@TronusGames/games
🟢 Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=7350736874255872221
⚫ Indie DB: https://www.indiedb.com/company/tronusgames

🔵 Facebook: https://facebook.com/tronusgames
🔵 Twitter: https://twitter.com/tronusgames
🟣  Instagram: https://instagram.com/tronusgames
⚫ TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@tronusgames
🟠  Reddit: https://reddit.com/r/TronusGames
🔴 YouTube: https://youtube.com/channel/UCFgxHSCQQ5OJJWaLgthvUMA?sub_confirmation=1
🟣 Twitch: https://twitch.tv/tronusgamesofficial/about
🟣 Discord: https://discord.com/invite/hdx8dVpmaU
🔵 Donations: https://paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=8L8RY5CB9HGUG
🟠 Patreon: https://patreon.com/TronusGames



Musics and Sounds by Marco Marocco, Intro background Art by Jonathan Calsolaro.
Under © Copyright.


#videogames #gaming #mobilegaming
